item.title: Juston add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Juston add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Juston add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Juston add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Juston add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everything must be made as simple as possible. But not simpler." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juston add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juston add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juston add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juston add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juston add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Out of clutter, find simplicity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juston add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Juston add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "And in the end it is not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Juston add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Whatever you are, be a good one." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Juston add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Juston add a quote by Colin Powell
item.description: "Perpetual Optimism is a Force Multiplier." -- Colin Powell

item.title: Juston add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Everyone is ignorant, only on different subjects." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Juston add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I never think of the future - it comes soon enough." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juston add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Juston add a quote by Charles Schwab
item.description: "A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm." -- Charles Schwab

item.title: Juston add a quote by William Arthur Ward
item.description: "The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails." -- William Arthur Ward

item.title: Juston add a quote by Tommy Lasorda
item.description: "The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination." -- Tommy Lasorda

item.title: Juston add a quote by Whitney Young
item.description: "The truth is that there is nothing noble in being superior to somebody else. The only real nobility is in being superior to your former self." -- Whitney Young

item.title: Juston add a quote by Alexandra Stoddard
item.description: "The thoughtful little things we do each day have an accumulated effect on all our tomorrows." -- Alexandra Stoddard

item.title: Juston add a quote by Joe Paterno
item.description: "Act like you expect to get into the end zone." -- Joe Paterno

item.title: Juston add a quote by Vince Lombardi
item.description: "Life's battles don't always go to the stronger or faster man. But sooner or later, the man who wins is the man who thinks he can." -- Vince Lombardi

item.title: Juston add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
